channel.title: New RFCs
channel.description: Recently released Request For Comments documents

item.title: 8632: A YANG Data Model for Alarm Management
item.description: (163KB) This document defines a YANG module for alarm management. It includes functions for alarm-list management, alarm shelving, and notifications to inform management systems. There are also operations to manage the operator state of an alarm and administrative alarm procedures. The module carefully maps to relevant alarm standards.
